props.name: active
props.description: Marks the snackbar as active which causes it to display

props.name: timeout
props.description: The amount of time in milliseconds to show the snackbar

props.name: actionHandler
props.description: The function to execute when the action is clicked

props.name: actionText
props.description: The text to display for the action button

slots.name: (default)
slots.description: The default slot holds the snackbar text and can contain HTML

events.name: done
events.description: Dispatched when the active is changed
